name: Camus & the freedom train
description:
Only after the last river has been poisonned.
  Only after the last fish has been catch
  Only after the last tree has been cut down
  Only then you 'll realise that money
  can't be eaten"
                                             Indian prophecy

"Seulement après que le dernier arbre aura été coupé,
 Seulement après que la dernière rivière aura été empoisonnée,
 Seulement après que le dernier poisson aura été pêché,
 Seulement alors tu découvriras que l'argent 
 ne peut pas être mangé."
                                             Prophétie des Indiens Cree
                                    
Freedom train :
Drums :                      Fred  Bouché
Bass :                        JP Bonnefond  
Guitars & vocals :      Camus

Genre : "folk music" is more frequently used to describe a style of  music that has evolved rapidly over the last century .Any style of music which represents a community and can be sung/played by people who may or may not actually be trained musicians, using the instruments available to them.

As times have changed, folk music has changed to reflect the times. Many of the old labor and protest songs are still sung today, albeit with new verses that were added to reflect the context in which the songs were resurrected. 

Folk artists today are experimentalists who dabble in different genres, integrating various musical influences into their narrative songs.
Freedom train integrate into their songs musical influences
like  Folk , Blues, Grunge , Pop, Rock... Sincere Folk Singing.

French description:
Freedom train ne peut etre vraiment qualifié de folk ou de blues, mais entre de la soul et du jazz, du rock et la sensibilité, la sincérité de la folk music. ... toute une forme de communication pure, directe et sincère.

http://www.wix.com/freedomtrain/freedom-train

name: Is there a heaven?
description:
Folk rock blues acoustic music. Great slide guitar. FANTASTIC SOUND AND FEELING. Camus plays on vintage acoustic guitars , His roots approach to modern songwriting has also been compared Ben Harper ,Chris Whitley, Bob dylan,Alexi Murdoch, PIERS FACCINI, Ben howard...
Genre: Folk: Folk Blues
Release Date: 2009 

 Camus:
guitarist singer songwriter plays on acoustic guitar with often a slide ,
and his Deep, Warm Voice, that makes the hairs on your neck stand up,
Feel the grounding root extending deep into the core of the earth.
Begin to resonate and tone the sounds of the earth. Hear his voice.

        1. In the Desert 	       0:44 	 
	2. Is There A Heaven 	2:03 	 
	3. Lost My Job (acoustic) 	2:08 	 
	4. Indian Prophecy 	        3:15 	 
	5. Like A Bird            	3:01  
	6. I Know A Girl         	5:21 	 
	7. Brother                  	3:47 
	8. Crossroads            	5:08 
	9. Freedom Train       	2:58  
	10. In the Pines         	7:02 	 
	11. I Will                    	2:48  
	12. Lost My Job          	3:15 
	13. Republic              	1:21  
	14. Come Rain Or Come Shine 	3:33

name: Indian Prophecy
description:
Folk rock blues acoustic music. Great slide guitar. FANTASTIC SOUND AND FEELING. Camus plays on vintage acoustic guitars , His roots approach to modern songwriting has also been compared Ben Harper ,Chris Whitley, Bob dylan,Alexi Murdoch, PIERS FACCINI, Ben howard...
Genre: Folk: Folk Blues

RIGHT NOW ALL I NEED IS AN OLD ACOUSTIC GUITAR AND A SLIDE...
Camus is a slide guitar player and singer .Folk and blues music 

He Plays only on vintage acoustic guitars(1920 to 1960) like old NATIONAL and GIBSON guitars because these guitars have something to tell (mojo)
